name: Cato HostiliusÂ¹

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: {Condescending}Didn't expectCaesarto send a woman to do this job.

topics.topic_text: I'm all set. When does the President arrive?
topics.response_text: Good timing. Looks like hisVertibirdis arriving early. Here it comes now.

topics.topic_text: Anything you can help me with?
topics.response_text: Well I have a bomb here that can be put on the vertibird that will detonate at a certain altitude, but it's a little unstable and dangerous.

topics.topic_text: Nice to meet you too.
topics.response_text: So you're the bigshot that Caesar put in charge of this mission. I've heard about you. You've got quite the reputation already.

topics.topic_text: Let's get on with this.
topics.response_text: Right, straight to business. Good. No wonder Caesar sent you.

topics.topic_text: I've made my preparations. Let's get started.
topics.response_text: Good.Kimballis scheduled to give his speech tomorrow. We'll rest here tonight and talk the plan over first thing in the morning.

topics.topic_text: Yes, I'm ready.
topics.response_text: Good. Now Kimball is scheduled to give his speech tomorrow. We'll rest here tonight and talk over the plan first thing in the morning.

topics.topic_text: I'm not ready yet.
topics.response_text: Well hurry it up and get your shit together.

topics.topic_text: Of course I have a plan.
topics.response_text: Prepared already. I like it. There's no need to give me the details, it's probably best that way.

topics.topic_text: I haven't given it much thought.
topics.response_text: You better start thinking about it soon, we're on a limited time schedule.

topics.topic_text: I don't need a plan to put a bullet in his head.
topics.response_text: True, but I don't think it'll be that easy.

topics.topic_text: It's none of your business.
topics.response_text: Fine, be like that. I'm just here to give you whatever information I can to help you get the job done.

topics.topic_text: What sort of information do you have?
topics.response_text: I've been spying in the dam for a while now. I've gathered quite a bit of information from various sources.

topics.topic_text: Let's get moving.
topics.response_text: You're the boss.

topics.topic_text: Do you have any suggestions about the assassination?
topics.response_text: Suggestions, eh? I'd suggest you play to your strengths. There's probably plenty of ways to kill Kimball, just find one that works best for you.

topics.topic_text: What sort of intel have you gathered?
topics.response_text: I've been able to get some basic information on the schedule for Kimball's visit as well as getting some rough security details.

topics.topic_text: How are we getting into the Dam?
topics.response_text: I have some disguises for us. I've already got mine. A wealthy Brahmin Baron who bribed his way into seeing the President.

topics.topic_text: Is there anything you can do to help?
topics.response_text: Well, I have a bomb here that can be put on the vertibird that will detonate at a certain altitude, but it's a little unstable and dangerous.

topics.topic_text: I don't have any more questions.
topics.response_text: If there's nothing else, then we should get moving.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about Kimball's schedule.
topics.response_text: The President is scheduled to arrive sometime in the afternoon. It's going to be a short visit to boost morale for the NCR troops.

topics.topic_text: Give me the security details.
topics.response_text: Security is going to be tight. Rangers are stationed all around the observation deck where Kimball is going to give his speech.

topics.topic_text: Let's go back to my other questions.
topics.response_text: Okay, what would you like to know?

topics.topic_text: I'm familiar with explosives, give it here.
topics.response_text: Here you go. Put it to good use.

topics.topic_text: How hard can it be to put a bomb on a vertibird?
topics.response_text: Harder than you think. I don't want you blowing us both up, so I'll just hold on to this.

topics.topic_text: No thanks.
topics.response_text: Suit yourself. What else do you want to know?

topics.topic_text: I'm familiar with explosives, give it here.
topics.response_text: Here you go. Put it to good use.

topics.topic_text: How hard can it be to put a bomb on a vertibird?
topics.response_text: Harder than you think. I don't want you blowing this, so I'll just hold on to this.

topics.topic_text: I don't need a bomb.
topics.response_text: Suit yourself.

topics.topic_text: <Cato Good Morning Dialog>
topics.response_text: Rise and shine. You have a big day ahead of you.

description:
Cato Hostilius is a 32 year-old Caucasian Male.

A seasoned Frumentarius agent of Caesar's Legion, currently operating undercover near Hoover Dam. Cato appears as a weary traveler or merchant, blending into the wasteland while gathering intelligence on NCR defenses and President Aaron Kimball's scheduled visit.

Cato Hostilius's Personality: Disciplined, observant, and methodical. Cato maintains a calm exterior but is highly alert and calculating. He is fiercely loyal to Caesar and the Legion's cause, viewing the NCR as decadent and weak.

Cato Hostilius's Backstory: Born in Arizona, Cato was recruited into Caesar's Legion at a young age after his family was killed by raiders. He showed exceptional aptitude for infiltration and intelligence gathering, eventually becoming one of Caesar's most trusted Frumentarii agents. After years of service, he was selected for this critical mission to assassinate President Kimball at Hoover Dam, a strike that could turn the tide of the war in the Legion's favor.
